channel.title: BO on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in BO on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Dashboard
item.description: Dashboard Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10077 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/01_dashboard.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered

item.title: Orders
item.description: Orders Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10078 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/02_orders.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Orders > Orders page The Orders page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Click on the button “Add new order” The New order page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Orders > Invoices page The Invoices page is displayed

item.title: Catalog
item.description: Catalog Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10080 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/03_catalog.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Catalog > Products page The Products page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Click on the first row The product page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Catalog > Products page

item.title: Customers
item.description: Customers Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] Automation in progress Automated on : 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10081 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO -> Dashboard page The dashboard page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Go to Customers > Customers page The Customers page is displayed No JS errors are triggered Click on the icon “View” on the first row The “View customer” page is displayed
